p: The reduced energy flow from trophic levels 1 to 2 under the combined warming-acidification treatment ( OAT) coincided with a negative effect of warming ( T and OAT) on energy transfer efficiency between levels 1 and 2 (ANOVA, F 1,8 = 11.22, p = 0.010) ( Fig 1; S1 Table). In contrast, OA had no effect on energy transfer efficiency between these levels. Energy transfer efficiency between trophic levels 2 to 3 was not affected by either warming or acidification.
